title: #1,000sq. ft. 2 bed/ 1 bath Apt situated close to downtown Renton#
posting_body: ft. 2 bedroom, 1 bath apartment situated close to downtown Renton.
All units have decks with southern exposure and a great view of the valley.
Parking is free, bus stops are nearby and all major grocery stores and restaurants are in the area.
The unit is newly remodeled with new stainless steel applicances, including dishwasher.
Rent is $1300 /month includes Parking, water, sewer and garbage
